item.description: Testing around DateTime.Now is now native in .NET 8!

item.description: The Options pattern is THE way to configure your .NET applications.

item.title: Custom Exceptions and Serialization
item.description: Creating your own custom exceptions helps convey more meaning and information relavant to your application.
